```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(eventdataR)
library(edeaR)
library(processmapR)
library(processanimateR)
```



# Load example eventlog data

```{r}
events <- eventdataR::patients      # Simple eventlog containing 1050 cases
#events <- eventdataR::hospital
#events <- eventdataR::sepsis
```


```{r}
#summary(events)
```


# Process flow

```{r}
# Throughput times
processmapR::process_map(events, type = performance(units = "hours"))
```



# Dynamic process flow

```{r}
processanimateR::animate_process(events, type = performance(units = "hours"))
```

# Timeline overview

```{r}
processmapR::plotly_dotted_chart(events)
```
